documentation.text: @notice Stake FARA crystals for farming knight EXP & FARA token.
@notice Unstake FARA crystals from a knight.

balanceOf(uint256,address).notice: Gets total FARA staked of a Knight.

claim(uint256).notice: Harvest all EXP and reward earned from a Knight.

convertExpToLevels(uint256,uint256).notice: Convert all accumulated exp from staking to knight's levels.

earned(uint256,address).notice: Gets EXP and FARA earned by a knight so far.

unstake(uint256,uint256).notice: Unstake FARA crystals from a knight.
